ModuleTitle: Principles and Processes of Additive Manufacturing
ModuleDescription: This introductory module emphasizes additive manufacturing processes. Topics include 3D printing processes/materials, metal printing, etc. Students are expected to carry out an independent study by project or term paper on the related topics. A structured programme of lectures, term papers, and a final examination are included in this module.
Preclusion: ME5608: Additive and non-conventional manufacturing processes
